definition: in fact/in reality/as a matter of fact/in practice
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: None of this will actually be decided at Bali.
sentences.chinese: 所有這一切實際上都決定在巴里島。

sentences.english: And so, this actually is the input we needed to justify our criterion.
sentences.chinese: 這實際上是證明準則所需要的。

sentences.english: So when I woke up early this morning at 8am it was actually only 7am.
sentences.chinese: 所以，當我早上8點醒來時，實際上才7點鐘。

sentences.english: Mancini had effectively lost his midfield.
sentences.chinese: 曼奇尼實際上輸掉了中場。

sentences.english: You could actually use a closure to do the resource setup and cleanup instead.
sentences.chinese: 實際上可以使用閉包代替該方法來建立和清除資源。

sentences.english: This book is really Juliette's story, told in the third person.
sentences.chinese: 全書實際上是以第三人稱敘述了朱麗葉的故事。

sentences.english: The overpressure wave is actually the more dangerous of the two.
sentences.chinese: 實際上，這兩類傷害中超壓衝擊波尤甚。

sentences.english: Indeed, pain and itch have been difficult to separate.
sentences.chinese: 實際上，疼痛和瘙癢一直以來都很難分開。

sentences.english: So, in effect, the act of degree classification trivialises the student's achievement.
sentences.chinese: 因此，學位分級制度實際上輕視了學生的學習成績。

sentences.english: In fact, nothing teaches you sanctification like the life of marriage.
sentences.chinese: 實際上，沒有什麼比持續一生的婚姻更神聖的。

sentences.english: Most readers, in fact, understand the novel pretty well.
sentences.chinese: 實際上，大多數讀者都深刻理解了這部小說。

sentences.english: In fact, we heard that kid is right here in the jungle.
sentences.chinese: 實際上，我們聽說那個孩子就正好在森林裏。

sentences.english: In fact, reporters had been warned beforehand about the potentially over-aggressive conduct.
sentences.chinese: 實際上，記者們在之前被警告過潛在的侵犯行爲。

sentences.english: In fact, consider the CS50 Library.
Why do we not in fact call such a person a srotapanna.
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼我們實際上把一個人叫預流果呢。

sentences.english: In fact, there is no finite set of viewpoints.
sentences.chinese: 實際上，沒有有限集合的視點。
